third.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: coming after two other things in a series
third.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: one of three equal parts of something
third.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Two-thirds of the profits are given to charities.
A third of these jobs are held by women.
third.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: the lowest type of degree that is given by a British university
third.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: the third half, quarter etc of the financial year
